content: This man is actually the Yellow Loong, who claims he's been hiding upon the Ancient Master's garb as a pattern. As the last of the secret Loong bosses, he is an incredibly tough battle, especially at this point in the game, so you may want to back off and challenge him when you've got some stronger gear! If you're able to meet the challenge, you'll claim more materials needed to craft the ultimate Loong Staff, as well as a **Golden Carp Curio** , and the **Golden Lining Spell** to transform into the Yellow Loong himself!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Relief of the Fallen Loong'.
The content is as follows:
This man is actually the Yellow Loong, who claims he's been hiding upon the Ancient Master's garb as a pattern. As the last of the secret Loong bosses, he is an incredibly tough battle, especially at this point in the game, so you may want to back off and challenge him when you've got some stronger gear! If you're able to meet the challenge, you'll claim more materials needed to craft the ultimate Loong Staff, as well as a **Golden Carp Curio** , and the **Golden Lining Spell** to transform into the Yellow Loong himself!
